4.3.1.name: Webhook processing performance testing
4.3.1.description: Comprehensive webhook processing performance tests with single webhook latency, concurrent processing, signature verification, database storage, memory usage, and stress testing

4.3.2.name: Rate limiting compliance testing
4.3.2.description: Comprehensive rate limiting performance tests with baseline performance, sustained load compliance, concurrent requests, memory efficiency, timing accuracy, stress testing, and validator component performance

4.3.3.name: Retry logic performance validation
4.3.3.description: Extended retry performance tests with production scenarios including failure cascade recovery, long-running queue operations, high-frequency scheduling, backoff scaling performance, and cleanup operations under load

4.3.4.name: Memory and resource usage testing
4.3.4.description: Comprehensive resource usage tests with system resource monitoring, webhook processing memory efficiency, concurrent resource consumption, long-running stability, retry manager scalability, TypeForm client efficiency, rate limiting overhead, and integrated system performance

key_findings.summary: Performance testing phase completed successfully with comprehensive validation of all system components under realistic production load scenarios

critical_data.webhook_processing_performance: Single webhook latency < 50ms, concurrent processing > 100/s, memory growth < 100MB for 500 webhooks
critical_data.rate_limiting_compliance: 2 req/sec TypeForm compliance validated with 95%+ accuracy under all load scenarios
critical_data.retry_logic_performance: Production scenario validation complete - failure cascade recovery 15+ req/s, long-running queue operations stable
critical_data.resource_usage_efficiency: Memory efficient operation with < 200MB growth under sustained load, CPU usage < 200% under stress

cross_session_notes: Phase 4.3 Performance Testing Under Load completed successfully with all 4 tasks
All performance benchmarks met or exceeded expectations
System validated for production load scenarios including failure cascades and sustained operations
Resource usage optimized and memory efficiency confirmed under all test scenarios
Next phase 4.4 ready for documentation and deployment preparation
